Title: Shadowlands
Production_Co: Price Entertainment, Spelling Films International, Shadowlands Productions
Cast: Julian Fellowes, Roddy Maude-Roxby, Michael Denison, Andrew Seear, Tim McMullan, John Wood, Andrew Hawkins, Peter Howell, Anthony Hopkins, Edward Hardwicke, Robert Flemyng, James Frain, Toby Whithouse, Daniel Goode, Scott Handy
Plot: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets a spirited poet from the U.S. C.S. Lewis is the author of the "Chronicles of Narnia" books. Known as Jack, he teaches at Oxford during the 1950s. An American fan, Joy Gresham, arrives to meet him for tea in Oxford. It is the beginning of a love affair. Tragically, Joy becomes terminally ill and their lives become complicated. Written by Matthew Stanfield <mattst@cogs.susx.ac.uk>
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 10 nominations.
Location: Christ Church Meadow, Oxford, Oxfordshire, England, UK
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Julian Fellowes
Description: Directed by Richard Attenborough.  With Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Julian Fellowes, Roddy Maude-Roxby. C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets a spirited poet from the U.S.
